author: Jean P. May, Jr.
releaseNotes:
2.6.18 - Limit attribute size to 1024
2.6.17 - add currentMode and currentHsmMode attributes
2.6.16 - Allow reboot without Hub Monitor parameter
2.6.15 - Add option for reboot request from Hub Monitor if IP = 169.254.x.x
2.6.14 - zigbee channel bug
2.6.12/13 - Add option to suppress data attribute if zigbee null, HE API changes
2.6.11 - add option to pull additional subnets information
2.6.10 - remove the hub update response attribute - release notes push it past the 1024 size limit
2.6.9. - add ntpServer
2.6.8 - add hubUpdateVersion and hubUpdateResp
2.6.6/2.6.7 - add hubUpdateStatus to alert when FW update is available
2.6.5 - force a DB read for html builds
2.6.4 - suppress temperature event if negative
2.6.3 - move localIP into the poll cycle
2.6.2 - simplify unit retrieval
2.6.1 - report correct ZWave SDK
2.6.0 - adds Hub Information Aggregation integration
